author: cnbc.com
title: Vical reports 4Q loss
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) _ Vical Inc. (VICL) on Thursday reported a loss of $3.7 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the San Diego-based company said it had a loss of 21 cents.
The drug developer posted revenue of $4 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss widened to $13 million, or $1.01 per share. Revenue was reported as $13.8 million.
The company's shares closed at $1.60. A year ago, they were trading at $2.33.
